kadimayi aacharyathumani,oba nam maha pinwathekiya.oba labana aathmayehi kisidu dukakatanam path nowewi.maknisada, oba me aathmayehi boho pudgalayan gananak sathutin thabana nisayi.eth podi awulak atha.obe blog adawiya kiyawa awasan karana sama witama mage maniyan magen " mokada putha dan wela thiyenne?oya hamawelema lap eka laga idan badath allan hina wenne?me lamayata pissuwak hadilada manda.dosthara kenektawath pennanna oona" yayi pawasayi.ithin aacharya thumani oba mese minisun sathutin thabana nisa labana aathmaye aniwa ful joliye pasuwena bawanam mata huna kiwa wage kiyanna puluwan.obata jaya.ah kiyanna amathaka una.obath samaga mage kisima amanapayak natha.mama obe blog adawiyata ful pracharanayak laba dena bawada pawasiya yuthuyi.ehenam suba pathum.chirath kalayak blog eka liyanna labewa kiya prarthana karanawa.

amathi rajitha senarathna mahathage prakashaya sambandhayen 'bibisi sinhala sewaya' wetha karunu dakwu wasudewa nanayakkara manthriwaraya, "eeka lankaweth wuna bawa api piliganna oona, deparshawayema satankaruwange prahara, prathi praharawalata madiwechcha janaya yam widiyakata winashayata pathwunayi kiyala," yayi pawasiya.
dan nam dethun denekma liyala thiyena nisa ee gana godak liyawila wage kiyalayi hithenne.
lesa hadunwana me palama kotas dekakata digaharena athara ehi athi wisheshathwaya nam palama mitar 19k nathinam adi 60k digin yuktha wimayi.
ithin ee sudda me na kolayen widyuthaya nipadawime kramayath kopi kaloth makkeyi koranne?

mema sewawa laba dena apa jyothisha shasthraya, nawina batahira widyawa, pariganaka widyawa, batahira tharaka widyawa yana wishayan wala pashchath upadhi mattame sudusukam laba athi athara mema karthruge kisima jyothisha guruwarayek shri lankawa thula nomathi bawin mehi bhawitha kara athi jyothisha mula dharma lokaye oonama jyothisha prawinayan samaga sakachcha kirime danumak ha hakiyawak athiwa jyothishshasthraya pilibadawa unanduwak dakwana oba wetha idiripath kara atha.

yanna wishala gataluwak.

oon winadi 5k withra gatha kiyala winadi 10k withra niwuwas kiyala podi wikarayak natuwa.

thada una ho kampanaya athi wita una basa shariraya sithala wima, same athiwana rathu pallam, rudhira pidanaya adu wima, akmawa idimima, kuddeti idimima, samehi itha kuda rudhira galim rathu dam pahayata athiwima, nasayen widurumasen le galima, adhika osap rudhira pitawima, kopi kudu patata wamanaya athiwima ho le wamanaya athiwima, angapatha allu wita athiwana wedanawa, mita amatharawa rogaya ugra wu wita penahalu ha bade wathura ekathu wimath awasanayedi molayata adala sihimurja wima, walippuwa wani roga lakshanath dakiya haki we.me nisa dengu rogaya maranthika rogayaki.dengu roga lakshana pudgalayagen pudgalayata wenas wana nisa ihatha roga lakshana galapa ganimedi itha prawesam wiya yuthu we.
hangila hitiye na....
depilama kala yuththe eyayi.
kawada hari kridakayek wewi.
meka mama liyala awurudu 2k withara wenawa.
aneka wadi hariyak mewye thiyenne aanduwata gewana badune…

ee senakage katahandayi.ee handa asenawath samagama ma yanaya athahara bimgeyi wiwaraya thibu desata diwagiyemi.senaka guha wiwaraya asala bima wathiri sitinu ma hata daknata labini.ohuge andum leyin waki thibini.mama waha ohuwa waththan kara yanaya asalin indawa nawatha bimgeyi wiwaraya wu desata diwa giye karali nayaka jayasinha soyana balaporoththuwen.ma guha wiwaraya asalata yathma senaka kendirili handin yamak pawasanu asini.yanayata nagi siyalu samajikayanda me wana wita senakawa wata karagena sitinu daknata labuni.
api nam mathata thitha thibba...sharira kuduwa gana hithala...
namuth wiyapath wuwek raka balaganima...ithama wagakimen kala yuthu deyak....
(henri jayasenayan pilibandawa boho thathu mehidi hamu wewi.)
aliya lakunin tharanga kala manthriwarunta lipiyak
ese hiruta samipa wima nisa grahakaye kuda kotas bidi, ema sunbun grahakaya gaman karana kakshayata ekathuwima siduwenawa.
kohewath salli aran nikam pas karanne na..ehema kaleath eyalata pawathmak na..
oba labadena dhairyayata nawatha warak sthuthikarana athara sath samudarata lipi liyanawata amatharawa mama sinhalen ape de gana liyawena wishwakoshayakatath lipi sapayanawa...
api denna ee gana salasum kara hemihemin thamayi thiranaya karanne.
(ee siduwima gana pada peliyakuth liwwa) aadaraya kiyanne aththatama mokakda?
yata ma malaya nagarayata watena warsha jalaya ekras wana suwisal tankiyak lesa kriya karayi.
ehema baluwoth ohu jiwath wela hitiya kaledo wunath ohu nathi thanaka hari ohuta ahenne nathi thanaka hari ohuwa wiwechanaya karana eka waradi wenna oona.
dan hari neda?
charma roga sandaha....

nawatha in wasara 37kata pasuwa 19 wani sanshodhanaya nisa rajyaye kendriya balaya janadhipathi wethin iwath kota janadhipathi namamathrika janadhipathiwarayekuge thaththwayata path kota parlimenthuwen theri pathwana agamathi pramukha kabinat mandalaya rajyaya balaye pradhana kendrasthanaya bawata path kaleya.

ema mulika ketumpatha anuwa sakasena fedaral wyawasthawa parlimenthuwedi sammatha wuwahoth emagin itha pahadili lesama shri lankawa kabalikaranayata lak wenawa.

eyata hethuwa thamayi, me harakun wadipura pea්shanaya wanne minisunta wenath prayojanayak gatha no haki nisaru thana bimwalin wimayi.

diyunu kala haki manasak labima nisa, namarupa – anithya, dukkha, anathma lesa widarshana kara amaraniya thathwayata path wiya haki wuwoth, apata saba lesama “subhama subha upandinayak” sathuten samarannata puluwan neda kiya mata sithenawa.
apita ekathu wunoth me punchi bhumiye karanna bari deyak na.

ayi yako harak wada karana ewunta ee nama pawichchi kalama mokakda waradda?

ape thaththa ipadune 1939 nowambar 27 wanidawaka.me awurudde nowambar 27 wanidata thaththa hitiya nam wasara asuwak pirenawa.eewagema thamayi me desambar 13 wanidata thaththa nathiwela wasara 13 k sapirenawa.me siyalu de sihipath karamin thamayi mewara ‘ ran salakuna ‘ jana gi sandarshanaya pawathwanna api thiranaya kale.
me athara thrikunamalaye sita yapanaya dakwa muhudu pradeshawala da dhiwara ha nawika katayuthu awadanam bawa kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa sandahan kaleya.
